profile.name: UwUssimo Robinson
profile.bio: The Introvert Ex-Genemator guy who loves creating everything from scratch. He's so obsessed with IT, that he created platforms and services dedicating to Wiuterians which are free to use. Although, he is the creator of Mad Maids club which helps students by creating moden solutions for their problems.

project.name: Mad Maids
project.description: Mad Maids is an organization based club which strives to create solutions for every Wiuterian. Currently, Maids own popular platforms like Westmaid, Maiden, Slave, Maid Intranet/Hub, WeCon, Dungeon.

talkTitle: Bug Report or Help Request? Tools and techniques for telling the difference
